numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows the level of communication between children and parents.
2. The children do not currently live with at least 1 parent.
3. The graph shows how people contact their parents at least once a day.
4. The graph shows the percentage of people for each way of contact.
5. Young women are more likely than young men to contact their parents.
6. I wonder if women are more family-oriented than men.
7. I wonder if women are more thoughtful than men.
8. In-person visits are the least popular mode of contact.
9. I wonder if many children live far from their families.
10. I wonder if many children live in college.
11. I wonder if many children have moved away from their families.
12. I wonder what the specific age group of the survey participants is.
13. I wonder if responses differ between age groups.
14. An 18-year-old is an example of a participant.
15. A 24-year-old is an example of a participant.
16. The title of the graph is "Parents and Children: How Connected Are They Really?"
